Title: Simple WPF Spreadsheet
Description: A simple Excel-like spreadsheet with only basic functionalities
HomeWiki:
A very simple WPF-based spreadsheet application

  • written using Caliburn.Micro MVVM framework
  • expression evaluation relies on custom grammar and ANTLR-generated lexer/parser
  • optimized cell values recalculation (topological sorting and parallel evaluation when possible)
  • MEF is used for easy support of new custom functions

More details on architecture and features can be found on Documentation page.
